page.title: 04Purley Monday 1st July 1985
page.content: Purley is a very nice area. It is like a town but also like the countryside. There are lots of trees. There are quite a few shops around and a big shopping centre in the middle. There are lots of parks and woods in and around Purley. The houses are very nice. They are quite old and the gardens are big. It is not busy. The people who live here are quite rich. Old Lodge Lane has some shops along it and there is an ambulance station. There is a fire station on the Brighton Road. Purley is a very nice place to live in.
